response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. For this exceptional opportunity, I propose a price of $15,000. This reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing top-quality solutions to our esteemed clients. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product to your valuable business or project.", "product_price": 15000}
